channel.title: pip on tomjamescn's blog
channel.description: Recent content in pip on tomjamescn's blog

item.title: 国内可用的anaconda和pip源
item.description: anaconda源 清华 channels: - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/main/ - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/free/ - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/conda-forge/ - https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/pytorch/ - defaults ssl_verify: true 中科大 channels: - https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/main/ - https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/free/ - https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/conda-forge/ - defaults ssl_verify: true 上海交大 channels: - https://mirrors.sjtug.sjtu.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/main/ - https://mirrors.sjtug.sjtu.edu.cn/anaconda/pkgs/free/ - https://mirrors.sjtug.sjtu.edu.cn/anaconda/cloud/conda-forge/ - defaults ssl_verify: true 清华pip源 临时使用 pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple some-package 设为
